definitions: the state of living together and having a sexual relationship without being married

examples.text: couples increasingly prefer cohabitation to marriage

shortDefinitions: state of living together and having a sexual relationship without being married

definitions: the state or fact of living or existing at the same time or in the same place

examples.text: a harmonious cohabitation with other living creatures

shortDefinitions: state or fact of living or existing at same time or in same place
